Uses of Class
ourPackage.Item

    • Uses of Item in ourPackage

      Methods in ourPackage that return types with arguments of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> Stock.getStock()
      Returns a HashMap containing all the items currently in stock with their quantities as values.
      java.util.ArrayList<Item> Stock.loop()
      loops through the current stock of items and returns an ArrayList of type Item
      Methods in ourPackage with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Stock.addItem(Item item, int quantity)
      adds the item to the stock, updates quantity if the item already exists in the stock
      int Stock.getItemCount(Item item)
      returns an integer representing the quantity of the item
      boolean Stock.itemExists(Item item)
      returns true if the item exists in the stock, false otherwise
      void Stock.removeItem(Item item, int quantity)
      decreases the quantity of the an item
      Method parameters in ourPackage with type arguments of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Store.createTrucksFromStock(java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> coldStockMap, java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> hotStockMap, int coldQuantity, int hotQuantity, Manifest manifest)
      Create successive stock objects of correct size and optimal distribution and add them to trucks, which are then added to the manifests
      void Store.createTrucksFromStock(java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> coldStockMap, java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> hotStockMap, int coldQuantity, int hotQuantity, Manifest manifest)
      Create successive stock objects of correct size and optimal distribution and add them to trucks, which are then added to the manifests
      void Store.generateManifest(java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> coldStockMap, java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> hotStockMap, Manifest manifest)
      Generate a manifest given hashmaps of hot and cold items, and a manifest
      void Store.generateManifest(java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> coldStockMap, java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> hotStockMap, Manifest manifest)
      Generate a manifest given hashmaps of hot and cold items, and a manifest
      int Store.organiseCargo(java.util.HashMap<Item,java.lang.Integer> stockMap, Stock stock, int n)
      Organises the given items into truck sized stocks by modifying the given stock, then returns the number of items added, so that they can removed from the total count in the parent function.
